item.title: 5 questions about the St. Paul church disruption
item.description: Approximately 40 agitators invaded Cities Church during a service, verbally terrorizing parishioners and blocking exits, causing families to flee.

item.title: Border Patrol shooting in Arizona leaves person in critical condition
item.description: A shooting early Tuesday involving the Border Patrol near the U.S.-Mexico border in Arizona left one person in critical condition.

item.title: Trump's border wall sees slow start in second term

item.title: Reagan Airport air traffic controller 'overwhelmed' moments before midair collision
item.description: The air traffic controller managing flights at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport reported to a supervisor he was "overwhelmed" minutes before ...

item.title: Fire or impeachment: Democrats give Trump an ultimatum on DHS Secretary Noem
item.description: House Democratic leaders told President Trump Tuesday that if he won't fire Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem, they will move to impeach her.
